text: Va agar tarsided, ki [ʙa xotiri kostan az mahrija jo ʙadraftorī] natavoned adolatro dar haqqi duxtaroni jatim rioja namoed, [az izdivoç ʙo onon sarfi nazar kuned va] az zanon [-i digar]-e, ki mavridi pisandi şumost, [jak jo] du va [jo] se va [jo] cahor tanro ʙa hamsarī darovared. Pas, agar ʙim dored, ki natavoned adolat kuned, ʙa jak [zan] jo ʙa on ci [az kanizon], ki moliki onhoed [iktifo namoed]. In [kor] nazdiktar ast ʙa in, ki sitam nakuned
